channel.title: .NET Technology Show
channel.description: Backstage pass to all things ServiceStack & .NET
channel.itunes:author: ServiceStack
channel.itunes:subtitle: Backstage pass to all things ServiceStack & .NET
channel.itunes:summary: In this show, we explore the inner workings that goes into each ServiceStack Release and explore the benefits and purpose behind major features and how they can empower your next project and help you build better apps faster. We also dive deep into some of the most popular topics in modern web dev, API design, microservices architecture, and more.

item.title: Using llama.cpp to self-host Large Language Models in Production
item.description: A practical guide to self-hosting LLMs in production using llama.cpp's llama-server with Docker compose and Systemd
item.itunes:summary: A practical guide to self-hosting LLMs in production using llama.cpp's llama-server with Docker compose and Systemd

item.title: ServiceStack v8.8 Release
item.description: Latest features in ServiceStack v8.8 including TailwindCSS v4, AutoBatched Requests for Endpoint Routing and more!
item.itunes:summary: Latest features in ServiceStack v8.8 including TailwindCSS v4, AutoBatched Requests for Endpoint Routing and more!

item.title: Tailwind CSS v4.0 is here!
item.description: All ASP .NET Core Identity Auth Tailwind Templates upgraded to Tailwind CSS v4
item.itunes:summary: All ASP .NET Core Identity Auth Tailwind Templates upgraded to Tailwind CSS v4

item.title: New Angular 19 ASP.NET Core Identity Auth Tailwind SPA Template
item.description: Introducing our new Angular 19 IdentityAuth Tailwind Template with DarkMode and support for RxJS and Signals dev models
item.itunes:summary: Introducing our new Angular 19 IdentityAuth Tailwind Template with DarkMode and support for RxJS and Signals dev models

item.title: AI Server - May 2025 Update
item.description: New SOTA LLMs added, support for thinking responses, Ollama Vision Models & Generate API
item.itunes:summary: New SOTA LLMs added, support for thinking responses, Ollama Vision Models & Generate API

item.title: Text to Blazor upgraded to use best coding LLMs
item.description: Text to Blazor now generates CRUD Apps using best coding models from Google, Anthropic, Meta, DeepSeek & Mistral
item.itunes:summary: Text to Blazor now generates CRUD Apps using best coding models from Google, Anthropic, Meta, DeepSeek & Mistral

item.title: Complete Admin UI Management for Identity Claims and Roles
item.description: With support for adding Roles and User and Role Claims, the built-in Admin UI now offers complete Identity Auth management
item.itunes:summary: With support for adding Roles and User and Role Claims, the built-in Admin UI now offers complete Identity Auth management

item.title: ServiceStack v8.7 Release
item.description: Latest features in ServiceStack v8.7 including Analytics, Identity Auth Roles and Claims Admin UIs
item.itunes:summary: Latest features in ServiceStack v8.7 including Analytics, Identity Auth Roles and Claims Admin UIs

item.title: In Depth and Interactive API Analytics available to all ServiceStack Apps
item.description: Comprehensive and Interactive API Analytics in Admin UI offering deep insights into API usage, performance, users, API Keys & IPs.
item.itunes:summary: Comprehensive and Interactive API Analytics in Admin UI offering deep insights into API usage, performance, users, API Keys & IPs.

item.title: llms.txt and llms-full.txt support for Razor SSG and Razor Press
item.description: Free Razor SSG and Razor Press Static Site Templates now auto generates llms.txt and llms-full.txt files for Large Language Models
item.itunes:summary: Free Razor SSG and Razor Press Static Site Templates now auto generates llms.txt and llms-full.txt files for Large Language Models

item.title: New okai tool for Rapid App Development
item.description: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models
item.itunes:summary: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models

item.title: FREE Access to the worlds most popular AI Models
item.description: No API Keys, no Signups, just free access to the worlds most popular AI Large Language Models
item.itunes:summary: No API Keys, no Signups, just free access to the worlds most popular AI Large Language Models

item.title: New okai tool for Rapid App Development
item.description: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models
item.itunes:summary: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models

item.title: Text to Blazor Vue CRUD Apps
item.description: Discover how to quickly generate Blazor Admin CRUD Apps from a text description using the new okai tool
item.itunes:summary: Discover how to quickly generate Blazor Admin CRUD Apps from a text description using the new okai tool

item.title: ServiceStack v8.6 Release
item.description: The latest features in ServiceStack v8.6 including Text to Blazor and AI code generation!
item.itunes:summary: The latest features in ServiceStack v8.6 including Text to Blazor and AI code generation!

item.title: Introducing AI Server
item.description: Introducing AI Server - an OSS Self Hosted Gateway for running LLM, Ollama, Media and Comfy UI APIs
item.itunes:summary: Introducing AI Server - an OSS Self Hosted Gateway for running LLM, Ollama, Media and Comfy UI APIs

item.title: .NET 8 Templates migrated to use Kamal for deployments
item.description: All Identity Auth templates now use Kamal for deployments, simplifying the process of deploying .NET Apps to any Linux server.
item.itunes:summary: All Identity Auth templates now use Kamal for deployments, simplifying the process of deploying .NET Apps to any Linux server.

item.title: DTOs in all languages downloadable without .NET
item.description: ServiceStack Typed DTOs for all languages can now be downloaded and uploaded without .NET installed
item.itunes:summary: ServiceStack Typed DTOs for all languages can now be downloaded and uploaded without .NET installed

item.title: ServiceStack.Swift client library rewritten for Swift 6
item.description: ServiceStack.Swift has been rewritten to take advantage of Swift 6 features, now dependency-free.
item.itunes:summary: ServiceStack.Swift has been rewritten to take advantage of Swift 6 features, now dependency-free.

item.title: Typed Open AI Chat & Ollama APIs in 11 Languages
item.description: Introducing AI Server - an OSS Self Hosted Gateway for running LLM, Ollama, Media and Comfy UI APIs
item.itunes:summary: Introducing AI Server - an OSS Self Hosted Gateway for running LLM, Ollama, Media and Comfy UI APIs

item.title: Simple API Keys Credentials Provider for .NET 8 C# Microservices
item.description: Improved Simple Auth using API Keys and Admin UI that's ideal for .NET 8 C# Microservices
item.itunes:summary: Improved Simple Auth using API Keys and Admin UI that's ideal for .NET 8 C# Microservices

item.description: The latest features in ServiceStack v8.5 covering release of AI Server and Kamal Deployments and more!
item.itunes:summary: The latest features in ServiceStack v8.5 covering release of AI Server and Kamal Deployments and more!

item.title: Podcasts now in Razor SSG
item.description: Razor SSG now includes support for Podcasts
item.itunes:summary: Razor SSG now includes support for Podcasts

item.description: Exploring different techniques in ServiceStack for building maximum value, high-performance Scalable SQLite Web Apps
item.itunes:summary: Exploring different techniques in ServiceStack for building maximum value, high-performance Scalable SQLite Web Apps

item.description: Checking out ServiceStack's new SQLite-backed C# Request Logs feature and enhanced log querying and filtering in the Admin UI
item.itunes:summary: Checking out ServiceStack's new SQLite-backed C# Request Logs feature and enhanced log querying and filtering in the Admin UI

item.title: C# Background Jobs
item.description: Taking a deep dive into C# Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management
item.itunes:summary: Taking a deep dive into C# Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management

item.description: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!
item.itunes:summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!

item.title: Commands Feature

item.itunes:summary: Looking into how to utilize C# Commands to build more robust and observable systems

item.itunes:summary: A look at how to use ASP.NET Core Output Caching and ServiceStack.Redis to cache the response of ServiceStack APIs in Redis

item.itunes:summary: A guide explaining how ASP.NET Core's Rate Limiter Middleware can be used to protect ServiceStack APIs and Apps from abuse
